text: The Volvo Gran Artic 300 is a proposed bi-articulated bus chassis manufactured by Volvo. It was developed in Brazil to operate on bus rapid transit systems. At 30 metres, it will be the longest bus in the world and be able to carry 300 passengers. It was launched in November 2016.Volvo launches the world's largest bus Volvo Buses 24 November 2016Volvo will sell the world's largest bus in Brazil Auto Blog 29 November 2016The world's longest bus Australasian Bus & Coach 2 December 2016 ==References== Category:Bi-articulated buses Category:Upcoming car models Gran Artic
title: Volvo Gran Artic 300
